column5: My father in law caught this fish last week in the French river just wondering if some one can help identify it.
I was thinking it may be but have never caught one so I thought better to ask the experts here. Thanks guys.
Split.pepper/salt and some smoke on the BBQ.
Toss that on a livebait rig and tow it behind the bot for muskie!
You can still eat it after if the muskie didn't....
Lake Nipissing is full of them. We used to catch 20 -30 a day ice fishing.
Up here we call them bait.
Don't forget to pick out all the parasites first! they are wormy devils...
